segments.text: I see the woman focused on drying a plate, seemingly safe in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can't help but notice the sink overflowing right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the edges, creating a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's as if she is oblivious to the chaos surrounding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it feels like an accident is about to happen at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching dangerously for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched, almost encouraging the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a blend of innocence and recklessness, watching them like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
